pages.text: The mod $(mod)Torchmaster$() adds a handful of lighting options.

pages.title: Mega Torch
pages.text: The $(item)Mega Torch$() prevents monsters from spawning within 64 blocks of itself.

pages.title: Feral Flame Lantern
pages.text: The $(item)Feral Flame Lantern$() will place invisible lights in an area around itself.
Breaking the Lantern $(o)should$() remove all the invisible light blocks, but if that doesn't work, the $(item)Frozen Pearl$() should do the trick.

pages.title: Dread Lamp
pages.text: The $(item)Dread Lamp$() prevents $(o)passive$() mobs from spawning within 64 blocks of itself.
